name: Somnium (doughtnerd)
description:
Story

You wake up in a strange a dreamlike world with strange creatures all around you. You don't remember anything about how you got there or why. All you know is that there's been an accident and people called 'figments' are dying because of it. You've been recruited to solve the mysterious deaths and perhaps through solving the deaths, you'll discover exactly why you're there to begin with.

Mechanics

  • Walk around and talk to the denizens of the new world
  • Use keyboard controls to rotate pieces of a puzzle and position them correctly in order to solve it.

Team

Karla Kraiss - Lead Engineer, Project Manager

Ada McFarlane - Lead Artist

Engine
